messages.message: Is there a way to tell which of these features are available to any user vs. an Instabase user? If not, I'd like to suggest that we denote the ones that are available to internal users only.
Any feature that shows up here is only for instabase users
That being said in the next release, 24.16, this features section is slightly changed to provide better descriptions for the status of these feature flags
OK, that is what I assumed, but wasn't sure. It would be really cool to see what version the feature is scheduled to be GA (with the understanding that it is an estimate/best effort).
This information is currently tracked in JIRA â€” I agree though it could be helpful to bring this into the product

My argument would be that when we're demoing to a prospect/customer/partner, I would avoid turning on features that aren't expected to be released soon (unless it is needed for the use case). At the moment, I have no idea (without cross-referencing Jira) which features are imminent versus farther off and I could confuse the people seeing the demo -- especially because we often give them a trial account.
